headline: Need low-effort dinner ideas? These 5 credit cards help you save on takeout, delivery and meal kits
summary: For days when you just don't feel like cooking, your credit card could have the answer.

headline: MPearlRock Announces Addition of Three Distinguished Operating Advisors to Strengthen Value Creation Capabilities
summary: NEW YORK, February 26, 2026--MPearlRock, a strategic partnership between MidOcean Partners, The Kroger Company, and its wholly owned data subsidiary, 84.51°, today announced the addition of Mark Ramadan, Bill Toler, and Bob Ostryniec as Operating Advisors. These appointments significantly deepen MPearlRock’s operating bench and reinforce its commitment to hands‑on, thoughtful value creation across its portfolio of high-growth consumer brands that are disrupting the food and beverage industry. Th

headline: Ocado wields the axe to save £150m as debt squeeze tightens
summary: Ocado has confirmed plans to cut around 1,000 jobs as it aims to save £150m to ease growing debt pressures.

raw.headline: Ocado wields the axe to save £150m as debt squeeze tightens

headline: Wells Fargo Turns Neutral on Kroger (KR), Flags Spending and Growth Concerns
summary: The Kroger Co. (NYSE:KR) is included among the 14 Best Affordable Dividend Stocks to Buy According to Analysts. On February 25, Wells Fargo downgraded The Kroger Co. (NYSE:KR) to Equal Weight from Overweight. It also lowered its price target to $68 from $70. The firm said it is becoming more cautious and prefers to move […]
